snippet: The Court of Arbitration for Sport has reduced the ban on Real Madrid signing new players to one transfer window from two, the tribunal said on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: The Court of Arbitration for Sport has reduced the ban on Real Madrid signing new players to one transfer window from two, the tribunal said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Tribunal Cuts Real Madrid Transfer Ban to One Window From Two
headline.print_headline: Tribunal Cuts Real Madrid Transfer Ban to One Window From Two
